dcterms:description: A dataset that explores the concept of smart radio environments enhanced by AI reconfigurable meta-surfaces, focusing on the potential of intelligent reflecting surfaces (IRS) in wireless communications.
dcterms:title: Intelligent Reflecting Surface (IRS) Aided Wireless Network

dcterms:creator: Q. Wu
R. Zhang
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on the enhancement of wireless networks through intelligent reflecting surfaces, aiming for a smarter and more reconfigurable environment.
dcterms:title: Intelligent Reflecting Surface Enhanced Wireless Network

dcterms:creator: S. Gong
X. Lu
D. T. Hoang
D. Niyato
L. Shu
D. I. Kim
Y.-C. Liang
dcterms:description: A comprehensive survey dataset that discusses the applications and advancements of intelligent reflecting surfaces in wireless communications.
dcterms:title: Survey on Intelligent Reflecting Surfaces

dcterms:creator: W. Qingqing
Z. Rui
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a joint design for active and passive beamforming in intelligent reflecting surface enhanced wireless networks.
dcterms:title: Joint Active and Passive Beamforming Design

dcterms:creator: X. Yu
D. Xu
D. W. K. Ng
R. Schober
dcterms:description: A dataset focusing on power-efficient resource allocation strategies for multiuser MISO systems utilizing intelligent reflecting surfaces.
dcterms:title: Power-Efficient Resource Allocation

dcterms:creator: X. Yu
D. Xu
R. Schober
dcterms:description: This dataset addresses the enabling of secure wireless communications through the use of intelligent reflecting surfaces.
dcterms:title: Secure Wireless Communications via Intelligent Reflecting Surfaces

dcterms:creator: B. Lyu
D. T. Hoang
S. Gong
Z. Yang
dcterms:description: A dataset that explores the integration of intelligent reflecting surfaces in wireless powered communication networks.
dcterms:title: Wireless Powered Communication Networks

dcterms:creator: T. Jiang
Y. Shi
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on over-the-air computation techniques utilizing intelligent reflecting surfaces.
dcterms:title: Over-the-Air Computation via Intelligent Reflecting Surfaces

dcterms:creator: K. Feng
Q. Wang
X. Li
C. Wen
dcterms:description: A dataset that applies deep reinforcement learning techniques for optimizing intelligent reflecting surfaces in MISO communication systems.
dcterms:title: Deep Reinforcement Learning for IRS Optimization

dcterms:creator: N. C. Luong
D. T. Hoang
S. Gong
D. Niyato
P. Wang
Y. C. Liang
D. I. Kim
dcterms:description: A survey dataset that discusses various applications of deep reinforcement learning in communications and networking.
dcterms:title: Applications of Deep Reinforcement Learning in Communications
